category.title: Sponsored graffiti
category.description: Allowed by owner of surface and not illicit

category.title: Small Tag < 1 foot D.
category.description: A small "tag" of less than 1 foot in Diamater. May be written in permanent marker.

category.title: Medium Tag < 3 feet D.
category.description: A medium tag less than 3 feet in Diameter. Usually spray paint. Tag completed in haste.

category.title: Medium Large Tag < 5 feet D.
category.description: A medium large tag less than 5 feet in diameter. Usually spray paint

category.title: Large Tag > 5 feet D.
category.description: Large tag greater than 5 feet in Diameter

category.title: Artistic Tag
category.description: A large drawing depicting something with some artistic merit.

category.title: Graffiti
category.description: Writing or drawings scribbled, scratched, or sprayed illicitly on a wall or other surface in a public place

category.title: Not Graffiti
category.description: Stickers or other forms of vandalism that are not considered graffiti

category.title: Cleaned and Graffiti Removed
category.description: An update category to show that the Graffiti has been successfully cleaned
